key.name: refresh-interval
key.description: How often to refresh the calendar data, in seconds

key.name: real-time-countdown
key.description: Whether to update the countdown every second

key.name: display-format
key.summary: Display format for the panel indicator
key.description: Format for displaying the next meeting countdown (standard or compact)

key.name: event-title-length
key.description: Maximum length of event titles in the panel display

key.name: event-types
key.description: Which types of events should be displayed

key.name: show-past-events
key.description: Whether to show events that have already ended

key.name: show-event-end-time
key.description: Whether to show the end time of events in the dropdown menu

key.name: status-bar-icon-type
key.description: Type of icon to display in the status bar (calendar, meeting-type, none)

key.name: meeting-services
key.description: Configuration for how to open various meeting service links

key.name: show-current-meeting
key.description: Whether to show the ongoing meeting instead of the next one

key.name: enabled-calendars
key.description: List of calendar source UIDs to show (empty means show all)
